description.text: You cause a small symbol to appear in the text of a written work. The text containing the symbol must be at least 25 words long. When anyone reads the text containing the symbol, the sepia snake sigil springs into being, transforming into a large sepia serpent that strikes at the reader, provided there is line of effect between the symbol and the reader.

sections.Components: V, S, M (powdered amber worth 500 gp and a snake scale)
sections.Targets: one touched book or written work
sections.Duration: permanent or until discharged; until released or 1d4 days + 1 day/level; see text
